author: Gwen Aviles
title: Madonna's coronavirus bathtub video garners mixed reactions
description: "That's the thing about Covid-19," Madonna says in the video posted to Instagram Sunday, "it doesn't care about how rich you are, how famous you are."
content:
The Queen of Pop has garnered criticism for appearing to "trivialize" the effects of coronavirus in a video taken while she sat in a bathtub full of rose petals as piano music played in the background.
"That's the thing about Covid-19," Madonna says in the v… [+2293 chars]
